tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife recently underwent an Ovarian cyst laparoscopic surgery performed by Dr. Shruthi sreedhar and we are very happy with the experience. From start to finish, the process was smooth and seamless, thanks to the expertise and care provided by the doctor and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from fibroids. Dr.Shruthi took quick decisions and right steps and explained the importance and we went for immediate surgery. The surgery was successful.

Consulted Dr. Shruthi sreedhar for my hysterectomy surgery. Doctor took good care and the surgery went well. Here staff and facilities are very good and friendly and the best part is I recovered fastly.

Dr. Shruthi Sreedhar provided an exceptional experience from scheduling to consultation. She attentively listened to all concerns, delving into my medical history before reaching conclusions. Dr. Shruthi's profound knowledge and experience were evident, accurately diagnosing my issue during the initial consultation, later confirmed by tests. The treatment plan was clearly explained, instilling confidence.Her bedside manner was excellent, ensuring comfort and obtaining consent at every step. The office environment was immaculate and soothing, with friendly and caring staff. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Shruthi Sreedhar to anyone seeking a gynecologist.

She explained everything to me in a clear manner.she is a wonderful surgeon.I really appreciate how she took her time to explain about advanced treatment and the treatment options with her knowledge information.I immediately felt at ease and felt assured in my receiving expert medical care from her

Dr Shruthi is very ************* *** supportive. Because of my frequent travel schedule I sometimes miss regular check-ups which are really important. Dr Shruthi guided me for the best women's health check up procedures and explained the details to me very patiently.

I am shalu,Dr Shruthi sreedhar's patient,I am very satisfied with Dr ,I did my laproscopy surgery with madam,
Before surgery madam explained very well and now I am very comfortable.
I am recommending this doctor
I'm very satisfied with Dr shruthi sreedhar consultation.  I'm recommending this doctor for the best gynecology treatment.
I'm very comfortable with dr Shruthi sreedhar's consultation, she is very friendly doctor.centre very clean  and neat overall experience is wow and very comfortable

I had my 1st consultation with dr shruthi sreedhar whose the most approachable doctor I have ever seen. She is very kind and explaining all the details very clearly.  There is no longer  waiting  time to see the doctor.
